name: Starchemy by TeamBrokenCat
description:
Cook potions for your customers but be quick, they won't be waiting for hours! If you don't make a potion in time, your overall customer happiness level is going to drop and you'll be risking to lose your business!

Made in 72 hours for the Unreal Engine 2018 Summer Jam 

UPDATE:

The original upload was packaged with an Epic graphics preset, which may be a bit taxing on lower end systems (especially something w/o a dedicated graphics card). So here's a re-upload with Low graphics preset in case you're getting low FPS with the original package: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pwHzDHvmvDQjm1vzXg2QuQ8sgJODgdiv/view?usp=shari...

Cheers
